meanings.sent1: The trainless station had no passengers waiting.
meanings.sent2: The trainless tracks were overgrown with weeds.
meanings.sent3: The trainless platform felt lonely without any trains arriving.
meanings.sent4: The trainless landscape seemed devoid of its usual hustle and bustle.
meanings.sent5: The trainless yard was eerily quiet without the usual sounds of locomotives.

meanings.sent1: She gazed at the trainless tracks, wondering when the next one would come.
meanings.sent2: The trainless journey left them stranded at the station.
meanings.sent3: The trainless depot made her rethink her travel plans.
meanings.sent4: The trainless commute felt strangely peaceful without the usual chaos.
meanings.sent5: The trainless locomotive shed echoed with emptiness.
